mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT rownum AS rm, a.* FROM(SELECT b.*, m.adminProfile FROM notice b, adminz m WHERE b.adminNum=m.adminNum(+) ORDER BY noticeNum desc)a)b WHERE b.rm>=#{startRow} AND b.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(noticeNum, adminNum, noticeTitle, noticeContent, writeDate) values(noticeSEQ.nextval,#{adminNum},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.adminProfile FROM notice b, adminz m WHERE b.adminNum = m.adminNum(+) and noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
